name: write_file
description:
Writes content to a specified file in the local filesystem.

The user has the ability to modify `content`. If modified, this will be stated in the response.

IMPORTANT: If a relative file path is provided (not starting with 'working-output'), the file will be automatically placed in the 'working-output' folder to keep generated content organized and separate from source code.

file_path.description: The path to the file to write to. Relative paths will be automatically placed in the 'working-output' folder unless they already start with 'working-output'.

content.description: The content to write to the file.
